sentences.sContent: Spaniels are my favourite breed of dog.
sentences.sCn: 西班牙猎犬是我最喜欢的犬种。

sentences.sContent: Eagles breed during the cooler months of the year.
sentences.sCn: 鹰在一年中较凉爽的季节交配繁殖。

exam.question: It is true that ______ a wild plant into a major food crop such as wheat requires much research time.

answer.explain: 句意：  的确， 把一种野生植物培育成一种主要农作物， 如小麦， 需要很长的研究时间。multiply：  乘， 增多； magnify：  放大， 夸大； generate：  产生。

synos.tran: 繁殖；饲养；养育，教育；引起

words.tran: 饲养员；繁殖者；起因；增殖反应堆
生产；培育；使…繁殖（breed的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a type of animal that is kept as a pet or on a farm
if animals breed, they  mate in order to have babies
